prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a tiny blue alien creature, sinister facial expression, large pointed ears, blue and red jester hat, regal blue imperial tunic with frills, smooth skin, sharp focus
feature_prompt: rubbery biological blue skin texture, detailed seams and stitching on tunic, sharp focus on face, shiny hat fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, human face, regular human height, organic skin, low quality, blurry, (deformed hat:1.3), short ears, friendly expression
